body.name: Modern Innovations 16 Inch Stainless Steel Magnetic Knife Bar with Multi-Purpose Functionality as a Knife Holder, Knife Strip, Magnetic Tool Organizer, Art Supply Organizer & Home Organizer

features: ★Powerful Magnetic Knife Bar: This modern magnetic knife bar is made from strong magnets and covered in elegant, satin finished, high grade stainless steel, accenting any kitchen décor.

★ Heavy-duty & Modern Design: This magnetic knife rack has a fully magnetic surface powered by a strong magnet, allows the magnetic knife holder to instantly hang even your largest knives safely and securely.

★ Organize it All: This magnetic strip has an extended length that allows you to hold more knives than most knife blocks on the market while still being small enough to versatilely fit into many nooks and crannies in your kitchen or workspace.
★ Great for Display: Use the magnetic knife storage strip to hold knives, scissors, tools, children’s’ toys, keys, and whatever else you can think of as the ultimate organizer.

★ Easy Installation: This magnetic knife tool bar comes with mounting hardware and easy to follow illustrated instructions included so you can mount the magnetic knife strip and organize your kitchen right away! *Actual length 15 3/4 inches to give you a little room to mount it.*
body.description: EASY INSTALLATION 3 Easy Steps to Mount Your Knife Bar: PULL OUT THE PLASTIC SEPARATOR Hold the knife bar firmly against a flat surface. With a strong grip, pull the plastic tab in a vertical motion to remove the separator, taking the backing with it. CREATE YOUR GUIDE MARKS Use the recessed hole to create your guide marks and drill your holes.TAP THE PLASTIC ANCHOR(S) INTO THE WALL with a hammer before screwing the mount into the wall. Carefully place your knife bar over the backing. Then you can begin use! Browse our Products:

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The Modern Innovations Elite Magnetic Knife Bar makes organizing your kitchen & home a breeze! Covered in elegant, satin-finished, high-grade stainless steel, our classic knife block has a fully magnetic surface powered by strong magnets with a sophisticated look that effortlessly compliments your home décor. Our knife bar is a smart replacement for old-fashioned knife blocks - they can hide mold and germs from dirty knives and are difficult to clean. That's why we've designed our knife bar with a smooth, stainless steel surface that can easily be wiped and cleaned without the need to scrub or use special tools to get into hard-to-reach crevices. Our knife block alternative will also keep your home a safer place for your kids as it allows you to place your knives high and out of reach, making sure your children don't get access to them. Our magnetic knife bar is also very easy to install with the installation hardware and illustrated instructions included.

What Makes Our Knife Bar Great? FULLY MAGNETIC SURFACE Our state of the art magnetic knife block has a fully magnetic surface, allowing you to confidently hang your kitchen knives instantly & securely within reach. EXTENDED LENGTH Our magnetic strip has an extended length, allowing you to hold more knives than most knife blocks, while still being small enough to fit into many nooks and crannies in your kitchen or workspace. ORGANIZE IT ALL Use our ultimate magnetic knife storage strip to hold knives, scissors, screw drivers, wrenches, drill bits, children’s toys, keys, and whatever else you can think. The possibilities are endless! PREMIUM STAINLESS STEEL Our magnetic knife bar is covered in elegant, satin finished, high grade stainless steel , accenting any kitchen décor. The premium quality stainless steel coating our knife bar is corrosion, heat, and fire resistant.

EASY INSTALLATION 3 Easy Steps to Mount Your Knife Bar: PULL OUT THE PLASTIC SEPARATOR Hold the knife bar firmly against a flat surface. With a strong grip, pull the plastic tab in a vertical motion to remove the separator, taking the backing with it. CREATE YOUR GUIDE MARKS Use the recessed hole to create your guide marks and drill your holes.TAP THE PLASTIC ANCHOR(S) INTO THE WALL with a hammer before screwing the mount into the wall. Carefully place your knife bar over the backing. Then you can begin use! Browse our Products: CAUTION: Magnets can damage TVs, computer monitors, credit cards, etc. *Pacemakers should be switched to Test Mode within 3 feet of the magnet DO NOT cut or drill into the magnetic board! You will likely hit the magnet. May result in injury. Be careful not to pinch your fingers/hand - the force from the knife bar to the backing is strong

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Attractive appearance & great function
reviews.reviewText: I have ten of these magnetic bars. I use them for my expensive German kitchen cutlery & to hold some of my tools on my work benches. These are much better than peg boards for holding tools. Strong magnetic retention. For the kitchen, they are magnetically attached to the fridge. Easy to use & removable for cleaning. For my work benches, they are attached with screws. Use caution when installing because they are strong magnets. Highly recommend for function and appearance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worked like i WANTED
reviews.reviewText: The frustration of cramming my assortment of knives into the limited space of my fork and spoon drawer finally led me to seek an alternative solution. This led me to discover a magnetic knife holder that revolutionized my kitchen organization. Crafted with a robust magnet concealed beneath a sturdy steel covering, this holder showcased its practical brilliance. The knives found their place effortlessly upon its surface, and what's more, they remained exactly where I positioned them.Beyond the evident organizational benefits, this holder offered a distinct advantage in preserving the condition of my knives. By ensuring that the blades didn't come into contact with other utensils or items, the holder effectively shielded them from potential dulling or damage. This thoughtful design significantly contributed to maintaining the sharpness and integrity of each blade.The installation process further demonstrated the holder's versatility. Opting for the drill-into-the-wall expansion anchor method, I securely mounted the holder in place. The result was a visually pleasing addition to my kitchen setup that seamlessly combined form and function. The holder's sleek appearance and its ability to effortlessly corral my knives not only elevated the aesthetic of my kitchen but also streamlined my cooking routine. This magnetic knife holder had indeed proven to be a remarkable solution, offering a blend of practicality, preservation, and aesthetic appeal that I thoroughly appreciated.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to mount
reviews.reviewText: It holds my knives, spatula and tongs incredibly well. The magnet is incredibly strong so be careful when mounting, but once on the wall, it is perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish and well made knife rack.
reviews.reviewText: Strong magnet to use on refrigerator or can attach to wood. Very handy to use. Modern look.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install; strong magnets
reviews.reviewText: This looks great in my small kitchen and serves a couple of purposes:1. I have limited counter space so getting rid of the knife block helps open a little more space up.2. It keeps the knives farther out of reach of the kid.Both huge pluses!Install was easy, I mounted two separate bars in a corner (see pic) and used the supplied hardware to mount to my drywall. The drywall anchors included are not the best, but your typical little cylinders. I usually use my own anchors but for this, they seemed to work out pretty good. They aren't holding a ton of weight, so I wasn't overly concerned and they are not pulling out from the wall. The actual steel bar magnetically attaches to the mounting bar/bracket - this is a very strong adhesion! Watch your fingers! You'll know what I mean if/when you go to install it. This bar has plenty of magnetic strength, so you don't have to worry about knives slipping down or anything like that. It takes a little force to remove your knives - but I'd argue this is just the right amount. Not too strong, definitely not weak. I had originally thought about mounting directly on the underside of my corner cabinet (so the knives would basically be hidden and parallel to the countertop), and while I decided against that, there is plenty of strength if you choose to do so.The only con I have is that some of my knives like to turn/angle a bit on the magnetic knife bar, as opposed to staying straight up and down. I am still messing with the order of the knives a bit, and it seems that some spots do this worse than others, I assume because there are a series of magnets (maybe they are round?) within the knife bar itself. It is worse with smaller knives, compared to larger knives with more steel/wider blades. Of course, when writing this most of my smaller knives are dirty from prepping dinner, so the typical culprits are not in the pic I attached.Overall I'm happy with it so far, and the wife likes it too (minus some of the knives angling a bit). She hated our knife block, so this was my remedy for that, the price was right, and I have to say, it looks pretty sharp.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great and perfect size
reviews.reviewText: This knife magnet is perfect. We needed a place for oversized butcher knives (and a way to show them off), and this was exactly it. Hung vertically the knives have to hang at an angle with the handles stopping their movement, but we only wanted to hang 4 large knives, so it fits what we wanted. We mounted it with Gorilla heavy duty tape, which would support up to 9lbs for this 18” magnet. With the knives, total weight is ~5.5lbs and seems to be holding great. Definitely recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple and Clean
reviews.reviewText: This magnetic knife bar was exactly what I was needing. Simple, clean, stainless steel. Matches all of my stainless steel appliances. It got my knife set out of the knife block that was on the counter and holds them nicely within reach. Mounting was simple and the magnets hold my entire set of 8 knives.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOOKS & WORKS GREAT
reviews.reviewText: I wasn't sure I'd like this bar since the style is a little modern looking for my home, but I was pleasantly surprised after installation. It looks great and the 18" holds lots of knives. I was concerned it wouldn't hold my heavy knives, but the magnet attraction is excellent. I love having my knives off of the countertop. Very happy with my purchase.
Super easy to install, looks nice. The magnetic strength is good enough for several knives/utensils- but it isn’t too difficult to remove them, or put them back up.
Llegó a tiempo y sin problemas. Para mi uso tiene suficiente poder magnetico.
Esta muy fuerte, se ve de buena calidad y muy estético
Delivery was quick. Installation was very easy. It works perfectly!! Very strong magnet. I would highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Works and Looks Great - Nice and Strong
reviews.reviewText: I've had this for a few months now and can't find any flaws. The magnets are strong - I have a full selection of knives completely using all 24" of the strip and install took moments. I'd totally recommend this.
